0000101101001010 0101111101010111 1 -> sum: 0110101010100010, cout: 0
0011110110101101 0010001111010101 1 -> sum: 0110000110000011, cout: 0
1111000001001000 1010010000000011 0 -> sum: 1001010001001011, cout: 1

0100000000110000 1000001011101010 1 -> sum: 1100001100011011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
